mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ht_borrow_tender bt INNER JOIN ht_borrow b ON bt.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_info binfo ON b.borrow_nid = binfo.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_recover br ON br.borrow_nid = bt.borrow_nid AND br.nid = bt.nid LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_inst_config hic ON hic.inst_code = binfo.inst_code

SELECT b.borrow_nid AS borrow_nid, hic.inst_name, b.user_id AS user_id, b.borrow_user_name AS username, binfo.`name` AS borrow_name, bpt.borrow_name AS borrow_project_type_name, CASE WHEN borrow_style = 'endday' THEN CONCAT(b.borrow_period, '天') ELSE CONCAT(b.borrow_period, '个月') END borrow_period, CONCAT(b.borrow_apr, '%') AS borrow_apr, bs.`name` AS borrow_style_name, bt.nid AS order_num, bt.loan_ordid AS loanOrdid, bt.user_name AS tender_username, bt.user_id AS tender_user_id, hic.inst_code AS inst_code, bt.create_time AS create_time, bt.account AS account, bt.account - bt.loan_fee AS account_yes, bt.loan_fee AS loan_fee, bt.loan_amount AS recover_price, bt.loan_fee AS service_price, bt.`status` AS is_recover, br.create_time AS time_recover, b.plan_nid, bt.tender_user_attribute AS tender_user_attribute, if(bt.invite_user_id=0 or bt.invite_user_id=null or bt.invite_user_id= '','',bt.invite_user_attribute) AS invite_user_attribute, if(bt.invite_user_id=0 or bt.invite_user_id=null or bt.invite_user_id= '','',bt.invite_user_id) AS tender_referrer_user_id, bt.invite_user_name AS tender_referrer_username, bt.invite_region_name AS department_level_1_name, bt.invite_branch_name AS department_level_2_name, bt.invite_department_name AS team_name, binfo.entrusted_flg AS entrusted_flg, binfo.entrusted_user_name AS entrusted_user_name FROM ht_borrow_tender bt INNER JOIN ht_borrow b ON bt.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_info binfo ON b.borrow_nid = binfo.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_recover br ON br.borrow_nid = bt.borrow_nid AND br.nid = bt.nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_style bs ON bs.nid = b.borrow_style LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_project_type bpt ON bpt.borrow_cd = CAST(b.project_type AS CHAR)
LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_inst_config hic ON hic.inst_code = binfo.inst_code
ORDER BY bt.create_time DESC, br.id DESC
LIMIT #{limitStart} , #{limitEnd}

SELECT SUM(a.account) AS account, SUM(a.recover_price) AS recover_price, SUM(a.recover_price_over) AS recover_price_over, SUM(a.service_price) AS service_price FROM ( SELECT bt.account AS account, bt.account - bt.loan_fee AS recover_price, CASE WHEN bt.status = 1 THEN bt.loan_amount ELSE 0.00 END AS recover_price_over, bt.loan_fee AS service_price FROM ht_borrow_tender bt INNER JOIN ht_borrow b ON bt.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_info binfo ON b.borrow_nid = binfo.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_recover br ON br.borrow_nid = bt.borrow_nid AND br.nid = bt.nid LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_inst_config hic ON hic.inst_code = binfo.inst_code
) a
